cast.overview: A romantic comedy centered on Dexter and Emma, who first meet during their graduation in 1988 and proceed to keep in touch regularly. The film follows what they do on July 15 annually, usually doing something together.
cast.title: One Day

cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
cast.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

details.biography:
Trained Actress from Drama Studio London with experience both on Stage and in Film.

My experience paved the way for me to be cast in the Award Winning short film JUMP which was screened at IMAX Cinema in 2009, a role in “Waking the Dead” channel 4 series “Camelot” and recently appeared in the Nollywood movie “Amina” which premiered at Empire Cinema Leicester Square.

2013, I played five characters in the production of the JungleBook at The Lion &Unicorn Theatre.

2014, I took on the role of a mum who suffers from Psychosis in the play " So U Think I'm Crazy" which we took on tour.
details.name: Augustina Amoa
